titlestmt.titleproper: Gordon Hendricks research files on American artists

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-04-06 16:07:36 -0400.

did.unittitle: Gordon Hendricks research files on American artists

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Unmicrofilmed gift: use requires an appointment and is limited to Washington, D.C. office.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Material on William Bradford (loan): Patrons must use microfilm copy.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Unmicrofilmed: Research files for Hendricks's books, EADWEARD MUYBRIDGE, FATHER OF THE MOTION PICTURE, 1975; THE PHOTOGRAPHS OF THOMAS EAKINS, 1972; WINSLOW HOMER, 1979; AND ALBERT BIERSTADT: PAINTER OF THE AMERICAN WEST, 1979, containing correspondence, manuscripts, notes, photographs, clippings and printed material. Also included are vintage photographs by Bradley and Rulofson, I.W. Taber, Carleton E. Watkins and the Bierstadt Brothers, and an advertisement "Proposal for Publishing an Engraving of Mr. Bierstadt's picture of the Rocky Mountains."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Reel 3002: Research files for Hendricks's unpublished book on William Bradford, a New Bedford, Mass. marine painter. Included are correspondence, notes, slides, photographs, clippings, printed material, and a list of Bradford's paintings.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: 35mm microfilm roll 3002 available at Archives of American Art offices and through interlibrary loan.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Material on William Bradford, reel 3002: Originals returned to the Old Dartmouth Historical Society Whaling Museum, New Bedford, Mass.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Material on reel 3002 lent for microfilming 1983 by the New Bedford Whaling Museum; unmicrofilmed material donated 1983 by Guido Castelli.
